About Me

I am a passionate web developer and designer located in Serbia. My true joy lies in creating applications that tackle real-world challenges, all while offering a delightful user experience. My areas of expertise encompass JavaScript, React JS, and Vanilla CSS, allowing me to bring innovative digital solutions to life.

Drawing from a diverse background in customs clearance and transportation, I possess a strong foundation in this field. My educational journey includes a degree from a distinguished High Mechanical school, along with comprehensive training as a Freight Forwarder. Beyond my tech pursuits, I also nurture a dedicated interest in managing a boxer dog kennel, showcasing my multifaceted passions.

Get in Touch

Are you in need of a high-performance and user-centric website to effectively showcase your product or business? Are you seeking expert consultation, have specific queries, require valuable advice, or simply want to initiate a professional conversation? I welcome your communication on any front. Whether you're considering a project collaboration or aiming to discuss industry insights, I'm here to engage in a meaningful dialogue. Additionally, if you're representing a company and exploring potential partnership opportunities, I'd be glad to connect. To get in touch promptly, kindly reach out via email – a swift and reliable means of communication. Your inquiries and business interests are of utmost importance.
